name: Mathketball
0:
”Alexa math ball”
”Start a game with 2 players”
”start a three point contest”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math ball
des: Mathketball brings together the fun of math and basketball. Play it to sharpen and improve your math knowledge and skills. Challenge your friends to a game or go for a high score in the three point contest. Afterwards, learn something new by listening to the top five plays of the week. Mathketball focuses on mental math, addition, and multiplication.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
